Parameters.Name: Features

Test.Name: GetCapabilities - Supported (no authentication requaered)
Test.Description:
FeatureDiscovery Spec 5.2 Item: 1a --> 4 GetCapabilities - supported No authentication requaered Other feature request is out of scope
Before this test cases make sure that GetCapabilities are in pre_auth.xml list.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
STEP 1 - Get capabilities (no credentials supplied) Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
GetCapabilities: SUPPORTED

Before this test cases make sure that GetCapabilities are not in pre_auth.xml list.

STEP 2 - Get Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
GetCapabilities: SUPPORTED

STEP 4 - Check GetCapabiilities and GetServices GetCapabilities: SUPPORTED GetServices: NOT SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Analyze Device Service capabilities Use GetCapabilities response STEP PASSED
